main event: A ground-radar observation recorded in Liconnville, Maine on 12/23/55 reported a single object flashing green with no sound, and it was wide in the rear.
interesting points: The observation was made by ground-radar, indicating a technological and detailed recording of the sighting.
A photograph was taken during an investigation conducted on 21 Dec 54, showing an object 14.6 ft long and 6 ft wide in the rear, flashing green.
The report mentions a ground visual observation with no aids used, indicating that the object was visible to the naked eye.
The sighting involved unidentified aircraft and was reported to Air Force bases for investigation.
The report mentions scattered sunlight reflections, hinting at possible natural phenomena that could explain the sighting.
photographs: yes, a photograph was taken during investigation
